instructions: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In a small bowl, beat the yogurt, egg, butter, leomon zest, and lemon juice until smooth.
Stir the yogurt mixture into the dry ingredients just until moistened.
Fill muffin cups 2/3 full.  Bake at 400 for 18 minutes or until golden brown.
